channel.title: Couple things i need help with
channel.description:
Ok there's a couple of problems i need help with.
[s]Problem No. 1 God Sword.... FIXED Ok the problem with my god sword is that when ever i wield it it will do a rake/some farming tool motions... Like my hands will go back and forth like a rake or a broom and i have no idea whats wrong with it.. So if anyone could help thankkkk youuu! [/s]
[s]Problem No.2 Yell command FIXED Ok yell command will not seem to work... I don't know if there's 2 parts of the command but it just won't shout out to the players.. That's all for that[/s]
[s]Problem No.3 Pickup Command FIXED Ok i got no idea why this wont work i gotten about 3 different codes for pickup command it just won't work... Like pickup god sword i do ::pickup 15335 1 doesn't work so i try ::pickup 15335 001 still nothing I don't really get whats wrong with it because all the other servers it worked well.... Sooooo if you could help thank you[/s]
I am using the blank silab source so i need to make everything myself so please someone help with my porblems...
REQUEST STILL NEED Also one more thing i want to ask. Is there a normal runescape npc file? So it has the right npc's in the right places.. Also with shops is there an original one so there isn't like a crystal bow in the archer shop
If anyone would please help me with my problem i will be sure to +rep any of you THANK YOU!

item.title: Couple things i need help with
item.dc:creator: @Cloud7Strife Cloud7Strife
item.description:
@Cloud7Strife wrote:

[quote=“Retard Monkey, post:8, topic:232503”]Stolen from ReapageScape V1 source --> [code] } else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5) {

        command.substring(5).replaceAll("no-ip", "imgay");
        command.substring(5).replaceAll("servegame", "imgay");
        command.substring(5).trim();

        if (muted == 1) {
            sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!");
        } else {
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName + " - "
                    + command.substring(5);
        }[/code][/quote]

Thanks very much! Now my problems are all solved thanks guys! but if anyone got a good autospawn.cfg and shop stuff thank you if you could give me it. anyways thank you very much guys for helping me

Read full topic
item.source: Couple things i need help with

item.title: Couple things i need help with
item.dc:creator: @Retard_Monkey Retard Monkey
item.description:
@Retard_Monkey wrote:

Stolen from ReapageScape V1 source --> [code] } else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5) {

        command.substring(5).replaceAll("no-ip", "imgay");
        command.substring(5).replaceAll("servegame", "imgay");
        command.substring(5).trim();

        if (muted == 1) {
            sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!");
        } else {
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName + " - "
                    + command.substring(5);
        }[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Couple things i need help with

item.title: Couple things i need help with
item.dc:creator: @Cloud7Strife Cloud7Strife
item.description:
@Cloud7Strife wrote:

[quote=“chassy13, post:6, topic:232503”]I told you, the raking animation is a standanim coded in by the person who made the source

search for getstandanim in client.java and search for your godsword’s code and where it says

return ####;

change the #### to the animation you want[/quote]

Ahhh ok now i get what you are saying tyvm. but just another problem that’s like changing the way it is held but he still is doing the forward backward motion.

Nvm sorry i just figured it out TYVM. I cant seem to find the right anim by any chance could you find me that if you can If its 2h anim (2064) then i got it all thank you

Read full topic
item.source: Couple things i need help with

item.title: Couple things i need help with
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

I told you, the raking animation is a standanim coded in by the person who made the source

search for getstandanim in client.java and search for your godsword’s code and where it says

return ####;

change the #### to the animation you want

Read full topic

item.title: Couple things i need help with
item.dc:creator: @Cloud7Strife Cloud7Strife
item.description:
@Cloud7Strife wrote:

[quote=“SkillersDream, post:4, topic:232503”]Two things…

  1. You Can’t Rep.
  2. Deleteing Items From a Shop Is Easy So Just Delete Them From It.[/quote]

True… But i also need autospawn.cfg so i dont have unneeded npc’s walking around and i’ve also havent played real runescape in a year or so so i cant do that myself…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 21, 2008, 04:20:24 pm[/size][hr]anyone?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 21, 2008, 04:39:26 pm[/size][hr]help?

Read full topic

item.description:
@Cloud7Strife wrote:

That Can’t be what God Sword’s suppose to do because other servers are different plus what is happening right now looks horrible

Sorry my mistake in the problem list thingy i meant to say does anyone have the original autospawn.cfg and the shop handler stuff. because i want actual npcs in the runescape cities…

item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

There is nothing wrong with problem 1, it is supposed to be a “stance”…

if you want to change it just search getstandanim in client.java

@Cloud7Strife wrote:

Ok there’s a couple of problems i need help with.

Problem No. 1 God Sword… FIXED
Ok the problem with my god sword is that when ever i wield it it will do a rake/some farming tool motions… Like my hands will go back and forth like a rake or a broom and i have no idea whats wrong with it… So if anyone could help thankkkk youuu!

Problem No.2 Yell command FIXED
Ok yell command will not seem to work… I don’t know if there’s 2 parts of the command but it just won’t shout out to the players… That’s all for that

Problem No.3 Pickup Command FIXED
